paper.title: Application of deep learning to option hedging strategy
paper.abstract: The emergence of the digital information age has sparked considerable interest in predictive analytics within the realm of finance. Predicting uncertainty lies at the heart of Financial Engineering, where crafting investment or trading strategies using suitable prediction methods can optimize profits. This paper provides a novel work that approves the application of computer deep learning neural network has ability to predict volatility of the BlackScholes model and its derivatives. Employing a data-driven methodology, deep learning neural networks are utilized for volatility prediction, investigating their potential to enhance the accuracy of stock volatility forecasts and options pricing. Subsequently, the forecasted outcomes are leveraged for designing and executing hedging strategies, leading to the creation of three delta hedging approaches based on the anticipated stock volatility. The effectiveness of deep learning neural networks in volatility prediction is demonstrated, showcasing their ability to dynamically capture volatility shifts and outperform traditional models in forecasting accuracy.

domain_result.justification: 该论文的核心技术是应用深度学习神经网络预测Black-Scholes模型及其衍生品的波动率，并基于预测结果设计对冲策略。波动率预测直接关联到衍生品定价，而对冲策略的设计属于金融风险管理的范畴。因此，该论文的研究成果主要应用于这两个领域。
